Contact Us

isotope capital– Launching & supporting your recruitment company, where a little difference goes an awfully long way

Please explore our offering and philosophy and if it resonates with you, then please do get in touch for a confidential chat about how to make your transition from Super Recruiter to Business Owner.

What is Isotope Capital? What do we do? How do we do it? Why do we do it? What are we looking for? Are we the only mob out there? What about some current clients?

What is Isotope Capital?

A Recruitment Investment Company looking to help?

Exactly that! Isotope is a specialist investment company, providing practical, pragmatic and professional start up support and funding to driven recruitment consultants looking to start their own recruitment ventures. Something the growing team at Isotope will always be focused on. Simply put, we look to work with motivated, experienced and enthusiastic entrepreneurial recruiters who, either from he day they started in recruitment or perhaps more recently, have had an insatiable hunger to start a recruitment business and naturally they would value some support and guidance in doing so.

Read More

Of course, Isotope invest & support a business to make a profit & naturally we speculate in the hope that we accumulate & obviously Isotope Capital is keen to make our millions through shrewd investing & identifying the right type of recruiters – but not at any old cost.

For us, “recruitment investment” is not an isolated or passive exercise. Its very success is rooted in helping the right type of talented & ambitious recruiter (or recruiters) achieve their goals &, yes, in doing so we hope to share in their success. There is no doubt that it is our responsibility to understand who you are; what you are looking to achieve & how best we can help you start & build your recruitment business.

In the hope that we provide the right capital, tools, facilities & support that you might need to get you to where you want to be, we work hard but also “smart”. With specialist support structures already in place, Isotope Capital really is a comprehensive & holistic solution for any recruiter seeking more than “just” money for their recruitment business.

& in case you ever wondered, we are called Isotope Capital as a gentle reference to our founder’s hard fought success in GCSE Chemistry many moons ago (FYI – an Isotope atom is almost the same as any other atom but in fact, has an extra proton, which is of course an obvious metaphor for Isotope Capital being just like any other Recruitment Investment firm, but only better with that little something extra).

Before he joined the wonderful recruitment world, apparently he got an “A” grade (although none of us has ever seen the proof!).

What do we do?

We Invest. We Support. We Develop.

Isotope identify exceptionally motivated & enthusiastic Recruitment Consultants who would like to run their own Recruitment Business. Having identified the right type of recruiter, Isotope offer a free “launch & support” model in exchange for a descending percentage of that new companies’ billings over a 4-year period. With no upfront fees or fixed monthly “service subscriptions” - the success of Isotope really is predicated on the success of the businesses we support.

Read More

It’s our very own “Rule of three” – we launch a business, we support a business, we develop a business. So, we launch the new recruitment business in every single area imaginable. From dealing with the accounting & back office infrastructure, to the creative & marketing side of the business, to providing the right recruitment tools to the business & finally ensuring the legal & compliance structure is established – that’s our investment into the recruiter we’re supporting.

Once the business is up & running (& the “launch stage” is complete), the experienced & skilled team at Isotope focus on the practical day-to-day support of that agency (known as the “support stage”). We aim to support the business in 5 distinct areas (click here if you can’t wait to find out what they are!) & commit to creating a relationship whereby the recruiters we work with focus on recruitment & Isotope focus on the practical, pragmatic & professional support of that business.

Providing all the tools you need; from the CRM & candidate attraction tools your market requires, to the right marketing & branding support, to the slightly more process driven accounting provisions – whether that’s dealing with the VAT man & all the other members of his “Tax” family, producing your Monthly Management Accounts or simply being there when it comes to invoicing, credit control & forecasting.

While the support is practical & is focussed around 5 clearly defined “areas”(again, if you really can’t wait, click here; we also know we are there holistically to support the recruiter & their business. So really, if you were to write down everything you feel you need to launch & support this new business; anything that falls outside the remit of “recruitment” is the responsibility of Isotope Capital.

How do we do it?

With care. With honesty & with Integrity.

Isotopes strategy is clear. We have, & continue to, identify budding recruitment entrepreneurs who want to start their own recruitment businesses. Like finding a metaphorical needle in a haystack, finding the right recruiter is often very different to finding “just a good recruiter”.

Once we have the opportunity to meet with “you” – i.e. a recruiter who would love to start their own recruitment business - we would then launch the new recruitment business for you. Simultaneously Isotope would enter into an agreement with your new venture. The contract would be between Isotope Capital & your new recruitment business, for example, ABC Recruitment (although we suspect you’re a little bit more creative than that!)

Read More

This contract clearly demonstrates that Isotope Capital would “contract in” with the new business for an opening period of 48 months & earn their revenue through a sliding scale percentage of billings made by that new company. More formally known in the Isotope world as the “Success Fee”.

The Success Fee is unique to every recruitment business we work with & is a direct reflection of the type of support & tools that recruiter & their business would require from Isotope. Through the 101 conversations we would have together, Isotope would understand what type of support is required & present back to you the offering & the “Success Fee Schedule” – which would be a maximum of 30% in Year 1 & would always reduce year-on-year. It is worth noting, in our experience, it would be extremely rare for a recruiter to require literally everything we can do & therefore it’s unimaginable that the percentage would ever start at a heady & hefty 30%.

There will always need to be an agreement in place; however the very philosophy & foundations of Isotope & the team we have, means that the agreement is needed but rarely referred to! The mentality of Isotope has & will always be the same – we will always respect the entrepreneurial recruiters we work with & as a result we will always go above & beyond any contractual obligations. Always above & always beyond.

After all, the success of Isotope is & always will be predicated upon the success of the recruitment businesses we support. Consequently – you have to ask the question, why would we not support each recruitment business in the most effective way for them to ensure they succeed & in turn, Isotope succeeds.

Why do we do it?

To Share. To Enjoy & to Participate.

Isotope Capital is a business. We are a business that needs to make profit. Profit is the only significant driver of our organisation. Growth is expected from our evil founder and demanded by everyone employed at Isotope. Numbers count and our favourite number is ‘bigger’. We are tigers. We are scary and we are everywhere ...

Or, to put it another way, we have found that by simply doing our best and aiming to over - deliver in any way that we can, Isotope Capital has been very successful so far and our plan is to continue not to worry too deeply about the numbers, but just to continue to focus on being the very best business in this space & for our recruiters.

Read More

Whilst not quite the traditional rhetoric of a typical Recruitment Investment firm, we have found this to be a very nice way to work and a fun environment to be part of. Why does everyone need to shout about how good they are? Why does an Investor need to wear red braces and refuse to take lunch? Seems daft to us! (& who doesn’t like lunch?).

At the end of the day, we are all trying to reach the same point. We all have families and we all have people rooting for us and worrying about us from the side-lines, so why can’t we all behave as if we are all on the same side? Maybe there is a better way than just screaming at numbers and throwing around the “C” words - caveats, clauses & conditions.

How about this for a “good” deal? You do exactly what you say you will do and do your best at all times and so will we. If you are worried about something, talk to us. If you need something, talk to us. If you’re excited, happy, anxious, scared or motivated – then please talk to us!

Now, that is a recipe for success and long-term partnership.

What are we looking for?

Experience, Enthusiasm & Empathy.

Naturally we will only accept exceptional recruiters with ground-breaking ideas riddled with innovation and a long, untarnished track record of success. You mustn’t “just” be looking to reinvent the wheel; we want a new car every time. I mean, who wouldn’t? To be “successful”, you must be an experienced businessperson with a demonstrative record of achievement across a number of sectors, over a number of years.

Furthermore, you must be able to convince the founder & their cynical investment cronies that you need us, respect us & appreciate that this business would be nothing without the support of Isotope. Because the old adage of the Recruitment deities is true – no recruitment business can succeed without the support of Isotope Capital.

Read More

Pfft – who are we trying to fool here?

Whilst all that sycophantic stuff might appear to be just the ticket, we are actually hoping to just be in the right place at the right time to partner up with some experienced, enthusiastic, empathetic recruitment consultants seeking some support & investment into their recruitment business.

We want to feel equally as enthused by your ideas & ambitions as you are & we really want to feel that this business is soon to be an extension of you – it’s just who you are. Our job would be to identify what you are looking to do & help create & drive that vehicle to help you get whatever it is you want “out” of your own agency.

A great way of explaining our ideal partner is to say that we are really looking for recruiters who would start & grow their own recruitment business with or without Isotope Capital & that really Isotope just so happened to be the best route to achieve their goals.

So, if you have a vison coupled with the drive, bravery & determination to “give it a go”, then get in touch and let’s see if we all share the same ideas & philosophy about how things can be done. You never know – it might be the best call you ever make?

Are we the only mob out there?

Nope. No way. No chance

For Isotope, the ideal Client is a motivated & ambitious recruiter whose enthusiasm for recruitment is only equalled by their enthusiasm for Isotope and desire to work with Isotope to build their recruitment venture. But are we really the only way you can do this? Surely not.

We feel that the best way to really showcase the fantastic offering of Isotope & the capabilities of our team is to very honestly, openly and transparently encourage you to also explore other options. However, just for the record and to be 100% clear, we don’t actively want you to disappear off and work with anyone else – we’re honest, but we’re not crazy!

Read More

We just feel it’s important that when you make the definite choice to allow Isotope to launch & support you in your new recruitment venture, it’s because you feel Isotope are the best option for you (& not just “the only one”).

Starting your own recruitment business is a massive decision & over the years of being fortunate enough to do what we do, we’ve become increasingly more aware of how important it is to work with personable, honest & driven people & so, it seems right to acknowledge that Isotope are not the only route for you to achieve running your own recruitment business. Whether you explore a Franchise route, self-fund the project or look to a Private Investor (you may or may not know), we want you to do your research.

Even within the nature of the Isotope offering there are people who have tried to copy, imitate or mirror a subset of what we do; it comes with the territory & if you would like to find out a little bit more about that then the history of Isotope is a great place to start (click here to understand more about some of the Isotope Team).

I guess in being so open & so transparent we really want to show you that we want every relationship we have, to get off on the right foot. Not through blind ignorance or wild suggestions that no one else can attempt to do what we do, but through the mutual acknowledgement that the Isotope offering is the most tailored & suitable solution for achieving your business ambitions. Our hope is that through understanding all the various routes & examining what they entail; you perhaps continuously revisit Isotope & choose to talk with us.

What about some current clients?

Construction. Lincolnshire-based. Family first. A business needs to work for you as much as you work for that business & for this caring & passionate recruiter, creating an agency that worked around their multitude of commitments was paramount to its success.
Construction. Newcastle-based. Vision driven. With a clear passion for what they do, it's no surprise the successes this Recruiter & his team have enjoyed since their inception back in 2018. They really do live & breathe what they do!
Automotive. Merseyside-based. Independent superstar. It was always apparent that this Recruiter knew what he wanted to achieve in his own agency. With that clear ambition it's no surprise this business is "driving" in the right direction.
Property. Manchester-based. Unrivalled professional. Not focussed on building "just another agency", this experienced recruiter started their own agency with the clear commitment to work with the candidates & clients they wanted to work with, in the way they knew was right.
Construction. Wiltshire-based. International Ambition. When this recruiter started their own agency, their ambitions were very clear. To grow, to scale & to build an asset. & to that we say, let's get going!
Business Improvement. Hertfordshire-based. A real expert. Since their inception back in 2018, it's been highly enjoyable to support & work with a recruiter with such genuine passion for their industry. It goes to show, if you love what you do – you'll always find success!
Information Technology. Essex-based. Ambition led. "Success" in business can be defined in so many different ways & for this ambitious recruiter, there dd not need to be just "one" definition. Flexibility, autonomy, financial freedom – you name it, they've earnt it.
Veterinary. Devonshire-based. Immensely Experienced. Bringing together a wealth of knowledge coupled with a consistent desire & passion to grow, this recruiter & their fantastic team have been achieving success in the veterinary space since 2016.
